TopicTitle: Previously Processed Science List in MPL

Articles.Content:
So, the MPL (Mobile Processing Lab) can't process the same science data twice.  Is there a way to see what it has processed so far so that I know if I've already brought up Farside Crater or East Farside Crater when I go gathering more data for the orbiting station?

Edited December 5, 2016 by WanderingKid
Nope. You have to keep your own list.
Anyway, anything that you gather twice you can always take back to KSC for science credit.

Just search for the string EXPERIMENT_DATA in your save file. Experiment names are pretty self explanatory. If you have multiple labs you need to figure out which one is which, though, but usually you should be able to distinguish them by looking at their current data/sci values.
